question: The quizmaster showed an image. What type of the shape is in the following image?

Lila saw the time on the clock. What kind of shape is the clock?
During the quiz, the children saw a picture of a donut. What kind of shape is the donut?
The quizmaster asked what type of shape is formed by a letter U. What is this shape?
The quizmaster showed them an arch of a bridge. What kind of shape is the arch of the bridge?
The quizmaster showed a picture of a kite. If the kite is flying in the sky, what kind of shape is it?
One of the questions was about the letter 'L'. What type of shape does the letter L represent?
The quizmaster asked the children to identify a shape that has no gaps and is all connected. What is this shape called?
